TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebException extends System.InvalidOperationException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type WebException = class inherit InvalidOperationException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 當透過可外掛式通訊協定存取網路發生錯誤時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while accessing the network through a pluggable protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自的類別所擲回和實作可插式通訊協定來存取網際網路。The class is thrown by classes descended from and that implement pluggable protocols for accessing the Internet. 當的子系所擲回類別，屬性將網際網路回應提供給應用程式。When is thrown by a descendant of the class, the property provides the Internet response to the application. **相關聯的秘訣****Associated Tips** **請檢查以判斷要求為何失敗的例外狀況的 Response 屬性。****Check the Response property of the exception to determine why the request failed.** 當 類別的子系擲回 例外狀況時， 屬性會將網際網路回應提供給應用程式。When a exception is thrown by a descendent of the class, the property provides the Internet response to the application. **請檢查以判斷要求為何失敗的例外狀況的 Status 屬性。****Check the Status property of the exception to determine why the request failed.** 例外狀況的 屬性會提供該錯誤的狀態資訊。The property of the exception provides status information for the error. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . **如果您已逾時，逐步執行 XML Web Service 時，設定無限的 XML Web Service 呼叫的逾時值。****If you are timing out when stepping into an XML Web Service, set the timeout value for the XML Web Service call to infinite.** 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 錯誤： Timeout While Debugging Web Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609)。For more information, see [Error: Timeout While Debugging Web Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體以初始化屬性設定的值為`message`。The instance is initialized with the property set to the value of `message`. 如果`message`已`null`，則屬性會初始化為系統提供的訊息。If `message` is `null`, the property is initialized to a system-supplied message. 並屬性會初始化為`null`。The and properties are initialized to `null`. 屬性會初始化為 。The property is initialized to . ## Examples 下列範例會擲回藉由指定的錯誤訊息。The following example throws a by specifying an error message. summary.span: 取得遠端主機所傳回的回應。

span.span: Gets the response that the remote host returned.

value.span: 如果可以從網際網路資源使用回應，則為包含來自網際網路資源之錯誤回應的 執行個體，否則為 。

span.span: If a response is available from the Internet resource, a instance that contains the error response from an Internet resource; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網際網路通訊協定，例如 HTTP，否則傳回有效回應，指出發生錯誤通訊協定層級。Some Internet protocols, such as HTTP, return otherwise valid responses indicating that an error has occurred at the protocol level. 當對網際網路要求回應指出發生錯誤時，設定屬性設，並提供，其中包含中的錯誤訊息屬性是擲回。When the response to an Internet request indicates an error, sets the property to and provides the that contains the error message in the property of the that was thrown. 應用程式可以檢查來判斷實際的錯誤。The application can examine the to determine the actual error. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查屬性，並將列印至主控台並基礎執行個體。The following example checks the property and prints to the console the and of the underlying instance. [!code-cpp[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/CPP/webexception_status_response.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/CS/webexception_status_response.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/VB/webexception_status_response.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出原因。The property indicates the reason for the . 值是其中一個值。The value of is one of the values. > [!WARNING] > 不會傳回錯誤至[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。The error is not returned to [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查屬性，並將列印至主控台並基礎執行個體。The following example checks the property and prints to the console the and of the underlying instance.
